name: Cable Matters 54Gbps Unidirectional USB C to DisplayPort 2.1 Cable - 3ft / 0.9m, Supports DP54, 8K@165Hz / 4K@480Hz (Thunderbolt 5 to DisplayPort Cable) - Not for Portable USB-C Monitor
short_description: Next-Gen Video Output with DisplayPort 2.1: Experience ultra-high-definition visuals with this USB-C to DisplayPort 2.1 cable, supporting up to 8K@165Hz, 4K@480Hz, and 4K@240Hz on supported devices. This USB-C to DP 2.1 cable is ideal for high-refresh gaming, content creation, and pro workflows with smooth motion and sharp detail.

DP 2.1 DP54 (UHBR13.5) 54Gbps Bandwidth: Built for DisplayPort 2.1 DP54 / UHBR13.5 performance with up to 54Gbps video bandwidth for demanding 8K and high-refresh 4K displays. Backward compatible with DP40, DisplayPort 1.4, and DisplayPort 1.2 GPUs and monitors.

Unidirectional USB-C to DP Connection: This Thunderbolt 5 to DisplayPort cable is unidirectional—connect from a USB-C/USB4/Thunderbolt 5/4 port with DisplayPort Alt Mode to a DisplayPort monitor (not for USB-C monitor input or portable USB-C monitors). Supports MST for compatible daisy-chain setups and audio including 7.1 surround (when supported).

Host & Display Requirements: To reach 8K@165Hz or 4K@480Hz, the host must output DP 2.1 over USB-C (or DP 1.4 HBR3 + DSC), and the DisplayPort monitor must support the same mode. Actual resolution/refresh depends on GPU/DP link rate, DSC, OS limits, cable length, and display specs.

Durable, Secure Fit: Reinforced build for daily use with a locking DisplayPort latch for a stable connection. Press the release button before unplugging to protect your port and ensure a secure fit for workstations, docks, and desktop monitor setups.

name: Silkland 80Gbps DisplayPort Cable 2.1 6.6FT/2M [VESA Certified], [8K@240Hz, 4K@540Hz 360Hz 240Hz] DP 2.1 Cable 16K, DP80 HDR DSC Display Port Cord Compatible FreeSync Gaming Monitor 5090 7900XTX,S1334
short_description: 【VESA Certified DP80 Cable 2M】Silkland 6.6FT Display Port 2.1 Cable is the first VESA-certified DP80 cable on Amazon. With 80Gbps bandwidth, it supports uncompressed 4K@240Hz, 8K@60Hz and 2K@540Hz resolution. Up to 16K@60Hz, 8K@240Hz, 4K@960Hz 540Hz 480Hz 360Hz with DSC enabled. DP80 cable compatible with UHBR20, dynamic HDR10+, 3D, and HDCP 2.3 for superior visuals. Backward compatible with DP 2.0, and DP 1.4, and supports flawless 7.1/5.1/2.0 uncompressed audio pass-thru

【Born for gaming】16K DisplayPort cable is tailored for high-end gamers. Featureing VRR, FEC, ALLM and DSC 1.2a technologies for stable, seamless data transfer and smooth, uninterrupted visuals, no lag, tearing and flickering. MST technology allows multi-monitor setups to expand your gaming world. Dynamic HDR enhances dark scenes and details, while 32-bit audio and lossless surround sound pass-through, helping you spot enemies in FPS and AAA games

【Top-Notch Quality】Silkland DP cable has no latch. Plug and play. Features 24K gold-plated connectors for optimal signal quality and corrosion protection. Built with 28AWG tinned copper conductors and triple shielding for stable, high-speed transmission. Tinplate blocks electromagnetic interference and minimizes signal loss. DP to DP cable with nylon exterior is 10 times more durable than PVC, withstanding bending and wearing for long-lasting performance

【Wide Compatibility】Our DisplayPort to DisplayPort 2.1/2.0 cable is compatible with all devices featuring DP ports. It works seamlessly with gaming monitors like Odyssey G8/G9, CHG90, CRG9, BenQ, Alienware, ROG Swift, LG Ultragear, ASUS, Acer, GIGABYTE, and more. It also supports popular graphics cards, including the RTX 5090D/5080/5070Ti/5070/4090/4080/4070Ti/3090/3080 Ti/3070, AMD 7900XTX/7900 XT, and others. Works with DP, DisplayPort++, and supports G-Sync, FreeSync for better gaming. *Please ensure your device is equipped with a DisplayPort port. The product does not support connection via HDMI, USB or other ports.

【Services from Silkland】We take pride in delivering top-notch cables and exceptional customer service. We are committed to supporting you throughout your purchase journey with our monitor cables. We offer a 24-month service and provide technical support within 18 hours to resolve any issues you may encounter

short_description: VESA Certified DisplayPort 1.4 Cable: This VESA certified DisplayPort cable 1.4 supports high-bandwidth HBR3 with up to 32.4 Gbps, DSC 1.2 (Display Stream Compression), FEC (Forward Error Correction), and 32 audio channels. The DP to DP cable is the perfect companion for high-performance GPUs like Nvidia RTX 3070 / RTX 3080 / RTX 3090 and AMD Radeon RX 6800 / 6900 graphics cards.

8K UHD Video & Immersive Audio Support: This premium Display cable supports resolutions up to 8K (7680x4320 @ 60Hz), 5K (5120x2880 @ 60Hz), 4K Ultra HD (3840x2160 @ 240Hz), and 1080P Full HD. The Display Port to Display Port cable enables flawless audio pass-through for uncompressed 7.1, 5.1, or 2-channel digital audio.

Perfect for High-Refresh Gaming Monitors: Designed for gamers, the 8K / 4K DisplayPort cable connects GTX and RTX graphics cards to monitors supporting up to 165Hz refresh rates. These DisplayPort cables are fully compatible with popular displays such as ROG Swift PG279Q / PG348Q / PG258Q, Samsung LC49HG90DMNXZA, Predator XB271HU, BenQ Zowie, Dell Ultra HD 4K P2715Q and MSI Full HD Non-Glare.

Multi-Stream and USB-C Compatible: The Display Port 1.4 cable (also known as DP 1.4 cable) supports MST (Multi-Stream Transport) for multi-monitor setups. Backward compatible with DisplayPort 1.2 cable, and fully compatible with USB C to DisplayPort adapters on laptops with USB-C or Thunderbolt 3.

Durable Construction with Secure Latch: Built for long-term reliability, this DisplayPort 144Hz capable cable features gold-plated connectors, bare copper conductors, foil & braid shielding, and a secure locking latch to prevent accidental disconnection during use. Note: Depress the latch before unplugging the cable to avoid damage.

NOTE: When the displayport cable does not work, please check whether the display input source is switched to DP (NOT HDMI) and whether the device resolution/refresh rate reaches 16K.
